name: NEXION
description: NEXION aims to become a widely used dApp ecosystem that offers users a variety of ways to participate and earn rewards! NEONs supply is capped at 1 Billion tokens and utilizes an auction-based token distribution structure which helps drives deflation and scarcity of the NEON token. 90% of the NEON supply gets distributed to users who enter in the NEXION Auction within the first 10 days. Features of the auction create daily deflationary measures as well as build store of value pools designed to reward users for participating and helping build the NEXION platform.
